name: Uptown Express
description:
Welcome to your first day at GDS!

Deliver packages, help your fellow GDS service members, and most importantly - be on time!

Controls

- Use "W", "A", "S", "D" keys to move around

- Use "M" to open the map

- Use "Escape" to show settings

----
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
Programming & Design by Lawrence Foley
Art & Design by Ryan Eads.

----
